# Assignment \#01

Execute Data quality Daschboard application using file results_MIMICIVdemo210426.json.

```{r echo=TRUE}
library("DataQualityDashboard")

DataQualityDashboard::viewDqDashboard(
  jsonPath = file.path(
    getwd(), 
    "results_MIMICIVdemo210426.json"
  )
)

```
